title: Various Views
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Oh, Kanan-san is already here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Kanan-saaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ah, Ayumu-chan. You’re early.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, I was so excited to hang out with everyone today, so I hurried here. You too, Kanan-san. It’s still 30 minutes away from our meetup time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>The weather is nice today, so I thought I could lay back and watch the sea of Odaiba. Looks like I came a little bit early.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>As expected of Kanan-san. You really do love the sea, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Of course I do. The sea and I have an inseparable bond, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Plus, The seas of Odaiba and Uchiura are always connected, you know? From place to place, time to time, the sea constantly changes. I want to see all the various views of the sea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>All the views of the sea? I guess I’ve never thought about that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, then, would you like to watch the sea with me until our meetup time? After all, this particular view of the sea only exists at this moment♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
